content: > this tiny little cardigan is designed > to fit the pop mart *labubu pendant > plush * this quick and easy knit is great for using up those small leftovers of your favorite sock yarns it is knit from the top down with a folded collar and raglan shaping **materials** needles 2 5 mm / us 1 5 circular needles or size needed to meet gauge *with a long enough cable for knitting magic loop style* notions bor marker scrap yarn for placing sleeves on hold*emphasized text* tapestry needle *for weaving ends* yarn fingering weight yarn is suggested for this pattern you will need 35 yds / 32 m or 8 g of yarn *swatch yardage is not included yardage is based on yarn that is approximately 463yds per 100g more or less yardage may bee needed based on yds per g* #labubu #labubucardigan #labubusweater
